      public Playlist getPlaylist(String playlistId) throws NotFoundException, PlaylistDatabaseException
      Gets a single playlist in the current organization context by its identifier.

      Parameters:
      playlistId - the playlist identifier
      Returns:
      the Playlist with the given identifier
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if there is no playlist with this identifier
